aboutUsText: The company "Smart Projects" Ltd operates in the field of finishing works for small (private) and medium-sized construction projects. Our management team consists of professional construction engineers with a combined experience of over 25 years in the construction sectorâ€”design and execution, both in the country and abroad. We have a team of over 10 people with multidisciplinary profiles, which allows us flexibility and efficiency in handling a larger number of complex projects both domestically and internationally.
